title: Best of The Program | 4/6/21
description:
Stu reviews every possible way to legally vote in Georgia under the state’s new laws. A school debates whether evergreen trees are racist. Is anything still NOT racist? Pat and Stu read a little from Hunter Biden’s memoir after he suggested that Russians could have hacked his laptop.
